summary: Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous.
cast: Winona Ryder|Barry Pepper|John Bourgeois|Rosemary Dunsmore|Paul Popowich|Adam Greydon Reid|Ellen Dubin|Sarah Manninen|Sarah Dodd|Lynne Griffin|Collette Micks|Kristi Angus|Frank Moore|Peter Windrem|James Downing|Ann Turnbull|Brad Borbridge|Carin Moffat|Brent Crawford|Sabrina Grdevich|Rick Roberts|Kelli Fox|Ivan Sherry|Suzanne Cyr|Kate Trotter|Jean Daigle|Carmen Noseworthy|Murray Oliver|Liz Gordon|Nancy Palk|Patrick Foran|Frank Orsini|Luke Vitale|Robert Verlaque|Arwen Humphreys
title: Cuando el amor no es suficiente: La historia de Lois Wilson
